unnormalised: Kindly provide the measurements in cm for accurate tailoring; conversion to inches (e.g., 36 in) can be done subsequently. Also, please specify the fabric width, typically 44" or 58", for optimal cutting.
normalised: Kindly provide the measurements in centimeter for accurate tailoring; conversion to inches (e.g., thirty six inches) can be done subsequently. Also, please specify the fabric width, typically forty four inches or fifty eight inches, for optimal cutting.
